channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVEMALL-268] train_ffm(features,label) causes NPE while train_ffm(features,label,'') works fine
item.description:
train_ffm(features,label) causes NPE while train_ffm(features,label,'') works fine.

Caused by: org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata.HiveException: Exception caused in the 1-th call of train()
	at hivemall.fm.FactorizationMachineUDTF.train(FactorizationMachineUDTF.java:404)
	at hivemall.fm.FactorizationMachineUDTF.process(FactorizationMachineUDTF.java:314)

	... 11 more

	... 18 more
item.summary: train_ffm(features,label) causes NPE while train_ffm(features,label,'') works fine

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
initScheme is not initialized when no hyperparameter is passed.
